Message.name: dateRead
Message.desc: The date/time at which the message has been read by the recipient if a single recipient exists.

Message.name: bccRecipient
Message.desc: A sub property of recipient. The recipient blind copied on a message.

Message.name: dateSent
Message.desc: The date/time at which the message was sent.

Message.name: ccRecipient
Message.desc: A sub property of recipient. The recipient copied on a message.

Message.name: recipient
Message.desc: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the receiving end of the action.

Message.name: sender
Message.desc: A sub property of participant. The participant who is at the sending end of the action.

Message.name: messageAttachment
Message.desc: A CreativeWork attached to the message.

Message.name: dateReceived
Message.desc: The date/time the message was received if a single recipient exists.

Message.name: toRecipient
Message.desc: A sub property of recipient. The recipient who was directly sent the message.
